title: <center><font size=
text: example data ‘lbh.est’ extended selection table containing long-billed hermit (Phaethornis longirostris) songs. data contains annotations wave objects 50 long-billed hermit songs 10 different song types (5 per song type, ‘lek.song.type’ column) recorded 8 leks (‘lek’ column) Caribbean slope Costa Rica. data set used Araya-Salas et al 2019 show lek (social group) level signatures song structure. See blog post details statistical analysis. spectrograms song types can displayed using catalog() function warbleR:  Song types labeled color groups consecutive spectrograms.
code: library(warbleR)  # create a color palette trc <- function(n) terrain.colors(n = n, alpha = 0.3)  # set global options for catalogs warbleR_options(same.time.scale = TRUE, mar = 0.001, res = 100, spec.mar = 1, max.group.cols = 5, ovlp = 95,  width = 23, height = 12.5, tag.pal = list(trc), hatching = 0, cex = 1.3, rm.axes = TRUE, path = "~/Dropbox/R_package_testing/NatureSounds/", box = FALSE)  # load data data("lbh.est")  # plot catalog catalog(X = lbh.est, flim = c(1.5, 10.5), nrow = 10, ncol = 5, group.tag = "lek.song.type", height = 25, cex = 2,         title = "Long billed hermits", img.prefix = "lbh.est", wl = 100)

title: <center><font size=
text: ‘monk.parakeet.est’ contains annotations wave objects 52 monk parakeet calls four different social scales (individual, flock, pair, site; ‘scale’ column). ‘ID’ column refers selections belonging individual scale == "Individual. See Smith-Vidaurre, Araya-Salas & Wright (2019) details.  case color groups refer different social scales data.
code: # load data data("monk.parakeet.est")  # monk parakeets catalog(X = monk.parakeet.est, flim = c(1, 11), nrow = 7, ncol = 8,  group.tag = "scale",          title = "Monk parakeets", img.prefix = "monk.parakeet.est", wl = 300)

title: <center><font size=
text: ‘thyroptera.est’ extended selection table Spix’s disc-winged bats (Thyroptera tricolor) social calls. data contains annotations wave objects social 8 individual Spix’s disc-winged bats (‘id’ column) belonging 4 social groups (‘group’ column). See Araya-Salas et al (2020) details. Can used (among things) test individual acoustic signatures.  Color groups refer calls individuals belonging social group.
code: # load data data("thyroptera.est")  # thyroptera catalog(X = thyroptera.est, flim = c(2, 60), nrow = 5, ncol = 8, group.tag = "group", title = "Spix's disc-winged bats", img.prefix = "thyroptera.est", wl = 300)

title: <center><font size=
text: package also includes 5 wave objects originally included example data warbleR. 4 wave objects long-billed hermit song bouts 1 2 songs little tinamou (Crypturellus soui).

title: <center><font size=
code: # load data data("Phae.long1", "Phae.long2", "Phae.long3", "Phae.long4", "Cryp.soui")  # spectrogram seewave::spectro(Phae.long1, wl = 100, scale = FALSE, ovlp = 90, grid = FALSE, palette = seewave::reverse.gray.colors.1, collevels = seq(-50, 0, 5)) # spectrogram seewave::spectro(Phae.long2, wl = 100, scale = FALSE, ovlp = 90, grid = FALSE, palette = seewave::reverse.gray.colors.1, collevels = seq(-50, 0, 5)) # spectrogram seewave::spectro(Phae.long3, wl = 100, scale = FALSE, ovlp = 90, grid = FALSE, palette = seewave::reverse.gray.colors.1, collevels = seq(-50, 0, 5)) # spectrogram seewave::spectro(Phae.long4, wl = 100, scale = FALSE, ovlp = 90, grid = FALSE, palette = seewave::reverse.gray.colors.1, collevels = seq(-50, 0, 5))

title: <center><font size=
code: # spectrogram seewave::spectro(Cryp.soui, wl = 1200, scale = FALSE, ovlp = 90, grid = FALSE, palette = seewave::reverse.gray.colors.1, collevels = seq(-35, 0, 2), flim = c(1.4, 2.4))

title: <center><font size=
text: Araya-Salas M, G Smith-Vidaurre. 2017. warbleR: R package streamline analysis animal acoustic signals. Methods Ecol Evol 8:184–191. Araya-Salas M, G Smith-vidaurre, D Mennill, P Gonzalez-Gomez, J Cahill & T Wright. 2019. Social group signatures hummingbird displays provide evidence co-occurrence vocal visual learning. Proceedings Royal Society B. 286: 20190666 Smith-Vidaurre G, M Araya-Salas, & T Wright. 2019. Individual signatures outweigh social group identity contact calls communally nesting parrot. Behavioral Ecology. Araya-Salas M, Hernandez-Pinson, N Rojas & G Chaverri. 2020. Ontogeny interactive call--response system Spix’s disc-winged bats. Animal Behaviour.   Session information

title: Authors and Citation
text: Araya-Salas, M. (2018), *NatureSounds: collection animal sound bioacoustic analysis R environment*. R package version 1.1.0.
code: @Misc{,   title = {NatureSounds: a collection of animal sound for bioacoustic analysis in the R environment},   author = {M. Araya-Salas},   year = {2018},   url = {https://github.com/maRce10/NatureSounds}, }

title: Animal Sounds for Bioacustic Analysis
text: NatureSounds package containing collection example animal sounds bioacoustic analysis. main goal provide example recordings animal sounds faciliate development bioacoustic tools R environment. possible, selection tables time/frequency coordinates sounds example recordings also included. Install/load package CRAN follows: install latest developmental version github need R package remotes: Please cite NatureSounds follows: Araya-Salas, M. (2018), NatureSounds: collection animal sound bioacoustic analysis R environment. R package version 1.1.0.
code: # From CRAN would be install.packages("NatureSounds")  #load package library(NatureSounds) # From github remotes::install_github("maRce10/NatureSounds")  #load package library(NatureSounds)

what: AnimalSounds: Animal Sounds for Bioacustic Analysis — NatureSounds

text: NatureSounds package containing collection example animal sounds bioacoustic analysis.  main goal provide example recordings faciliate development bioacoustic  tools R environment.

title: AnimalSounds: Animal Sounds for Bioacustic Analysis — NatureSounds
text: data sets provided extended selection tables. R objects contains annotations (locations signals time frequency) corresponding acoustic data wave objects. Therefore, **self-contained objects** since original sound files longer needed perform acoustic analyses. objects created `selection_table()` function warbleR. Take look intro warbleR vignette details. Check packages warbleR, tuneR seewave sound file manipulation analysis R. License: GPL (>= 2)

title: AnimalSounds: Animal Sounds for Bioacustic Analysis — NatureSounds
text: Marcelo Araya-Salas Maintainer: Marcelo Araya-Salas (marceloa27@gmail.com)

DATA SET RENAMED 'lbh.est'. 'Phae.long.est' DEPRECATED FUTURE VERSIONS.

title: Extended selection table of Spix's disc-winged bat social calls — thyroptera.est
